# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/requests/compat.py
@source-hash: 328f5ff7166979fa
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:58:59Z

## Purpose
Legacy compatibility module for the requests library, originally designed to handle Python 2/3 compatibility. Now serves as a consolidated import hub for standard library modules and type definitions.

## Key Components

### Character Detection (L17-23)
- `_resolve_char_detection()` (L17-20): Stub function that returns None, indicating chardet support has been removed
- `chardet` (L23): Module-level variable set to None, maintains API compatibility

### Python Version Detection (L30-36)
- `_ver` (L30): Alias for `sys.version_info`
- `is_py2` (L33): Boolean flag for Python 2.x detection (always False in modern usage)
- `is_py3` (L36): Boolean flag for Python 3.x detection (always True in modern usage)

### Standard Library Re-exports (L40-71)
- JSON handling: `json`, `JSONDecodeError` (L40-41)
- Collections: `OrderedDict`, `Callable`, `Mapping`, `MutableMapping` (L44-45)
- HTTP utilities: `cookielib`, `Morsel` (L46-47)
- I/O: `StringIO` (L48)
- URL parsing functions from `urllib.parse` (L53-64)
- Proxy utilities from `urllib.request` (L65-71)

### Type Definitions (L73-78)
- `builtin_str`, `str`, `bytes` (L73-75): String type aliases
- `basestring` (L76): Tuple containing both str and bytes types
- `numeric_types` (L77): Tuple of numeric types (int, float)
- `integer_types` (L78): Tuple containing only int type

## Architectural Notes
- Acts as a compatibility shim that centralizes imports
- Maintains backward compatibility while transitioning away from Python 2 support
- Provides consistent type definitions across the requests codebase
- Character detection functionality has been intentionally disabled/removed

## Dependencies
- Standard library modules: `sys`, `json`, `collections`, `http`, `io`, `urllib`
- No external dependencies
